attributes.action: We 'The People of the UK' demand that the BoE publishes its shareholders!
attributes.background: The Bank of England doesn't serve the people and it has not been nationalised. That is a fraudulent claim. We demand that the BoE publishes the shareholders for public scrutiny. We will no longer be enslaved by this private banking institution.

rejection.details:
HM Treasury (the Government) is the shareholder of the Bank of England. 

You can find more information about this here:

http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/publications/Pages/foi/disc091106.aspx
